name: Toastario
description:
Latest Update 20w48b (11.24.20):

-Mods now have a "Mod version" for the version of the mod itself, and a "Client Version" to say what version of the game it is for.

===========================================================

GAME DESCRIPTION AND INFO:

This is an early access survival game. (Will most likely be free until Alpha versions)

The game is only available on Windows.  Report all bugs down below.

HOW TO USE MODS:

-First go to your AppData folder, go to Roaming, then to the Toastario folder created when the game is launched for the first time. Drag the file into the Mods folder and run the game.

HOW TO MAKE A MOD:

 Make sure your using the Eclipse IDE. Create a project and add the "Toastario 20w48b.jar" file to the build path. Next, create a class and make it extend / inherit the "ToastarioMod" class, and boom, there you go. Here is a video:
